        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "

              data-insight="reviews-mention"

                Timely
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The feedback from Designli&#39;s clients consistently highlights their timeliness and responsiveness. Clients noted that deliverables were met on or ahead of schedule, with one stating, &#34;Theyve delivered everything on time and within budget.&#34; Another client emphasized their prompt communication, stating, &#34;They responded to any of my questions within 24 hours.&#34; Overall, the sentiment surrounding Designli&#39;s timeliness is overwhelmingly positive, reinforcing their reliability as a development partner.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

The quality of work was consistently praised, and while there were some challenges regarding communication and project scope, clients appreciated the team&#39;s efforts to resolve issues and fulfill commitments. This sentiment reflects a strong professional standard maintained throughout engagements.

      <p class="provider-insight__description">

For instance, one client noted, &#39;SolveIt has been the epitome of professionalism,&#39; while another remarked on their &#39;outstanding response to queries.&#39; Additionally, the company was commended for its strategic thinking and effective communication, with one client stating that they felt like &#39;their only client.&#39; Overall, the feedback conveys a high level of satisfaction with SolveIt&#39;s professional approach.
      </p>

They are noted for their clear communication and timely responses, with one client emphasizing their exceptional transparency throughout the development process. Another client highlighted Wve&#39;s ability to meet expectations and deliver quality work at an affordable price. Overall, the sentiment regarding professionalism is overwhelmingly positive, with clients feeling supported and satisfied with the outcomes of their projects.

            >MindSea is a mobile app development company specializing in iOS and Android development, with a strong focus on UX/UI design and agile project management. Their services are consistently praised for professionalism, quick response times, and a seamless integration into client teams, with 100% of the reviews highlighting their effective communication and team collaboration. However, some clients noted budget concerns, although many returned due to the quality and trustworthiness of MindSea's work.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        MindSea consistently receives positive feedback regarding their timeliness in project delivery. Clients report that MindSea meets deadlines and stays within budget, with one CEO noting they are &#39;always true to their word.&#39; Another client emphasized their ability to add resources swiftly when speed is a priority. Overall, the sentiment surrounding MindSeas timeliness is highly favorable, with clients appreciating their proactive communication and commitment to delivering quality work on schedule.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="28474"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="288244"
          data-gtm_insight_id="715145"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">App Dev, Web & Product Design for Health Data Analytics Co</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 12, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They delivered on time and were able to add resources when speed was a priority and deliver with more constrained resources when budget was the priority. They also were able to deliver outside of the project scope as requested and needed, helping with website design and other non-product related design work. Very simple pricing structure was appreciated.
            </p>

                Timely
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised CodePillow for their timely delivery and effective communication. One client noted that their marketplace was launched ahead of schedule, highlighting the team&#39;s commitment to deadlines. Another client emphasized CodePillow&#39;s strong time management skills, stating that they were upfront about potential issues and adhered to the project timeline. Overall, the sentiment regarding timeliness is highly positive, indicating that CodePillow is reliable in meeting project schedules.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1229792"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="136812"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1200408"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">E-Commerce Development for Online Marketplace</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 11, 2020</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Thanks to CodePillow team <b>we managed to launch our marketplace way ahead of schedule</b>. They provided good expertises in what we tried to achieve. Almost 100% uptime. We could contact them anytime help was required. <b>They delivered their part of code on time</b> with high quality.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/codepillow/136812"
            title="View CodePillow Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="1229792"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="136812"
            data-gtm_insight_id="1200408"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>

Additionally, their project management was effective, with most sprints completed on time, reflecting a strong alignment with client expectations. <section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently praised Danubius IT Solutions for their timely delivery and proactive project management. One client highlighted that timelines were met with functionalities going live without significant issues, while another emphasized the team&#39;s ability to complete tasks on time, even breaking complex tasks into manageable components. The overall sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for their reliability, flexibility, and alignment with business requirements throughout the project.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Results-oriented
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The feedback regarding STRV&#39;s results-oriented approach is highly positive. Clients appreciated their focus on deliverables and adherence to timelines, noting that all milestones were achieved. One client highlighted the effective communication and understanding of their vision, stating, &#34;They really understood the vision and goals we were trying to attain.&#34; Overall, STRV&#39;s ability to translate client objectives into a successful app significantly contributed to client satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="46156"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="41477"
          data-gtm_insight_id="781649"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Full Stack Mobile App Development for Wellness Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 1, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              In general, were deadline-oriented, so weve focused on deliverables and timelines. All of the specific milestones were achieved, and we had frequent check-ins to track everything they did. We had a beta test group before the public release, and we had various internal metrics to rate that success. They hit all of them, and all were correlated to the overall technology development. Weve been really happy with the general feedback from that.
            </p>
          </div>

Across various reviews, 100% of clients praised their responsive project management and technical skills, highlighting their ability to deliver on time and adapt to client needs efficiently. Although some clients noted areas for improvement in initial project planning and documentation, the overall feedback is overwhelmingly positive, with clients reporting increased user engagement and satisfaction post-collaboration.

        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Jafton consistently demonstrates strong project management skills, delivering projects on time and adapting quickly to client needs. Clients have noted their responsiveness and effective communication, stating, &#34;Jafton managed the project well, consistently delivering on time&#34; and &#34;They were responsive and kept everything running smoothly.&#34; Overall, the sentiment regarding their timeliness is overwhelmingly positive, with clients expressing satisfaction in meeting deadlines and receiving prompt updates throughout the project lifecycle.
      </p>
    </div>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="37795"
              data-gtm_insight_id="725604"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Timely
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Steamclock Software for their timely delivery of projects and features. One client noted the &#39;timely delivery of complex or time-sensitive functionality&#39; such as multi-factor authentication and live trading. Additionally, their project management was described as &#39;agile and focused on delivering results,&#39; with work consistently completed within established deadlines. Overall, the sentiment regarding timeliness is highly positive, reflecting a commitment to meeting client needs efficiently.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="37795"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="198077"
          data-gtm_insight_id="725604"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed high satisfaction with Peaks Circle Software&#39;s professionalism, highlighting their effective communication and project management. One client noted the team&#39;s ability to understand project requirements swiftly and deliver proficiently on both iOS and Android platforms. Regular updates and availability for meetings were appreciated, contributing to a seamless collaboration. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong endorsement of their professional skills and commitment to client success.
      </p>

            >Devsinc is a software development company specializing in Ruby on Rails and offering services such as portal maintenance, software development, and project management. They have received overwhelmingly positive feedback, with 100% of reviews highlighting their reliability and timely response. While some suggestions for improvement include enhancing turnover and seniority within their team, clients consistently praise Devsinc's commitment, communication, and technical expertise.

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1755717"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1069162"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Timely
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed a generally positive sentiment regarding Devsinc&#39;s timeliness in project delivery. One client noted their commitment and ability to deliver software in a &#39;time-conscious manner.&#39; However, they also indicated variability in performance across teams, suggesting that while some members excel in timely delivery, others may not meet expectations consistently. Overall, timeliness appears to be a strong point for Devsinc, contributing to client satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1755717"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="142803"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1069162"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Software Dev Staff Augmentation for IT Company </h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 80%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 6, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We measure their success based on their expertise and if they <b>provide timely delivery of our software</b>. Overall, part of the team is doing well, while another part isn't. When it comes to commitment, theyre great, and they <b>provide our software in a time-conscious manner</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/devsinc/142803"
            title="View Devsinc Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="1755717"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="142803"
            data-gtm_insight_id="1069162"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
      </ul>
    </div>

    <a
      target="_blank"
      href="/profile/devsinc#reviews"
      title="View Devsinc Reviews"
      class="provider__cta-link provider-insight__cta-link provider-insight__cta-link--reviews-mention sg-button-v2 sg-button-v2--secondary"
      aria-label="View Devsinc Reviews"
      data-link_text="Profile Reviews Button"
      data-gtm_provider_id="1755717"
      data-gtm_insight_id="1069162"
    >
      Read All Reviews
    </a>
  </div>

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Web &amp; Mobile App Dev for Robotic Vending Machines Company
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">

          Memory Squared has developed a mobile app for iOS and Android for a robotic vending machines company using Java. The team is currently developing a web app and optimizing the clients website.

    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="24742"
              data-gtm_insight_id="709405"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Timely
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Guaran Technologies has received positive feedback regarding their timeliness in project execution. Clients noted their responsiveness and adherence to deadlines, with one stating, &#34;Guarana released drafts and revisions when promised,&#34; and another emphasizing, &#34;They committed to the timeline and budget.&#34; The overall sentiment reflects satisfaction with their ability to deliver projects on time, contributing to a smooth development process and positive user experiences.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="24742"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="57482"
          data-gtm_insight_id="709405"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile Application Development for Freelance Designer</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 2, 2019</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Im impressed by the way they structure and approach projects in order to really help and guide their clients. They <b>commit to the timeline</b> and budget and pay attention to detail. Theyre very focused on the design and making things that are user-friendly.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/guaran-technologies/57482"
            title="View Guaran Technologies Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="24742"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="57482"
            data-gtm_insight_id="709405"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="24742"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="39249"
          data-gtm_insight_id="709405"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">iOS MVP Development for Lifestyle Startup</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.5</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 90%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 8, 2018</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The project was <b>delivered on time</b> and within budget, contrary to what some of my technical friends told me to expect. Guarana released drafts and revisions <b>when promised</b>, and they defined what theyd need from me in advance. They didn't over-promise on their turnaround time but still <b>delivered before the holidays</b>, which was important because the MVP is for travelers.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/guaran-technologies/39249"

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1734021"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1511485"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Professional
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express a highly positive sentiment regarding WinSoft.io&#39;s professionalism, noting their ability to complete tasks to a high standard and meet deadlines. One client emphasized that all features were well-tested and praised the detailed project management using Jira, which facilitated effective communication via Zoom and Telegram. Feedback consistently highlights the company&#39;s extensive experience and the pleasure of collaboration, with one client stating, &#39;Everything is perfect,&#39; indicating a strong satisfaction with WinSoft.io&#39;s professional approach.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1734021"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="38258"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1511485"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">

This company has <b>great experience</b> and it is a great pleasure to cooperate with them.

They have received a mix of both positive and negative feedback, with approximately 70% of the reviews praising their technical proficiency, project management, and commitment to quality. However, around 30% of reviews reflect concerns about communication and delivery issues. Many clients commend their problem-solving abilities and adaptability.

Clients consistently praised their project management, noting their responsiveness and ability to meet deadlines. For instance, one client highlighted their &#39;stellar project management&#39; and &#39;quality code,&#39; while another noted their &#39;exceptional development skills&#39; and &#39;outstanding efficiency.&#39; Multiple reviews emphasized their adaptability to client needs and proactive approach to problem-solving, reinforcing the sentiment that Appinventiv embodies a high level of professionalism in their work.
      </p>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Mobile App Development for Professional Networking Startup
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
          Appinventiv developed the MVP of an iOS and Android mobile app for a professional networking startup, using React Native, Firebase, and several integrations with providers like Stripe, Twilio, and
        
        <a
          target="_blank"
          href="/go-to-review/appinventiv/299773"
          title="Read Full Review on Appinventiv"
          aria-label="Read Full Review on Appinventiv"
          class="provider-insight__highlight-more-link"
          data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
          data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
          data-gtm_review_id="299773"
          data-gtm_insight_id="2052294"
        >
          Read more
        </a>
      </p>
    </div>

    <a
      target="_blank"
      href="/profile/appinventiv?service_provided=Mobile%20App%20Development#reviews"
      title="View Appinventiv Reviews"
      class="provider__cta-link provider-insight__cta-link provider-insight__cta-link--service-line sg-button-v2 sg-button-v2--secondary"

      data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
      data-gtm_insight_id="2052294"
    >
      Read 67 Reviews
    </a>
  </div>

      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
          Synodus developed a mobile app for an AI personalization platform. The team integrated the app with the client's backend, implementing features like push notifications and payment processing.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, the sentiment regarding PerceptionBox&#39;s timeliness is highly positive. Clients consistently noted that deadlines were met without fail. One client highlighted, &#39;They always meet deadlines and stay within budget,&#39; while another remarked, &#39;Theyve always been on time with the tasks assigned to them.&#39; Additionally, clients appreciated their responsiveness to inquiries and demands for resources, indicating a strong commitment to timely project management.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="331708"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="157222"
          data-gtm_insight_id="850038"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev for Gamified Sports Talent Discovery Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.5</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 90%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 7, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Their project management style is good  they <b>always meet deadlines and stay within budget</b>. We use Slack and Microsoft Teams to communicate and manage tasks through GitHub and monday.com.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, client feedback regarding Lead IT&#39;s timeliness is overwhelmingly positive. One project manager noted, &#39;They always kept their promises and deadlines,&#39; highlighting their reliability. Another client emphasized their effective time management during sprints, stating, &#39;The time management was great.&#39; Additionally, the founder of Rolulo remarked, &#39;The app arrived on time and fully functioning,&#39; which reflects Lead IT&#39;s commitment to timely delivery. Such consistent feedback underscores the company&#39;s strength in adhering to project timelines.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="845141"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="80614"
          data-gtm_insight_id="965108"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">

                Timely
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        VReal Soft consistently demonstrates timely project management across multiple client reviews. One client noted, &#34;all deliverables were correctly planned and delivered without any delays,&#34; while another highlighted their &#34;timely and efficient&#34; project management, emphasizing that tasks were logged meticulously for performance measurement. Additionally, VReal Soft&#39;s flexibility in accommodating changes was praised, with one client stating they completed updates on time, even when requirements were adjusted. Overall, the sentiment regarding their timeliness is highly favorable.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="161062"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="276397"
          data-gtm_insight_id="814758"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Development for IT Services Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Mar 18, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              In terms of management, VReal Soft was following an agile approach because they encountered some "unknown variables" during development. There were changes in API providers or communication with third-party services that couldn't have been planned initially. Despite this, <b>all deliverables were correctly planned and delivered without any delays</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Intelactsoft for their timely project delivery and responsiveness to needs. For instance, the IT Manager from Marsh Romania highlighted their agile approach and effective project management, stating they delivered on time while managing risks diligently. Similarly, the Marketing Specialist from Inctrl noted that Intelactsoft respected the timeline and made numerous changes to accommodate their requirements. Overall, the sentiment regarding timeliness is overwhelmingly positive, with no reported delays or issues.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1832332"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="189428"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1093246"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Platform Dev for Insurance Broking Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Mar 23, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Intelactsoft had an agile approach towards granulating the scope and delivering the results, which helped us understand what we want and how much we can achieve given the constraints we had. They had a skilled Project Manager who was always providing an accurate picture of the project's status, making sure the work within their team is properly assigned, and they <b>delivered on time</b> and managed the risks diligently.
            </p>
          </div>

        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight Ukrosoft&#39;s punctuality in project delivery. One client noted that the website was delivered on time and built according to their specifications, emphasizing the company&#39;s adherence to the agreed timeline. Additionally, their communication was facilitated through Slack, allowing for efficient updates and coordination. Overall, the sentiment regarding timeliness is very positive, with clients appreciating Ukrosoft&#39;s commitment to meeting deadlines without compromising quality.
      </p>

    class="provider provider-row sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed provider-row--non-ppc "

    type="button"
    name="bookmark"
    class="sg-shortlist-bookmark sg-shortlist-bookmark--default"
    data-shortlist-state="default"

    data-shortlist-link="https://shortlist.clutch.co"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently praise Ivejas for their professionalism and effective communication. One co-founder highlighted Kristijonas&#39; &#39;outstanding professionalism&#39; and his ability to understand project requirements seamlessly. The team&#39;s proficiency in English and their collaborative approach, utilizing tools like Skype and Slack, further contributed to a smooth project management experience. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for the company&#39;s professional demeanor and commitment to delivering quality results.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="214688"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="132899"
          data-gtm_insight_id="828000"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Platform Development for Job/Internship Referral Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 12, 2018</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Kristijonas <b>professionalism and understanding of the projects he takes care of are outstanding</b>. Hes a fun, dynamic, and innovative guy to work with!
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/ivejas/132899"
            title="View Ivejas Reviews"

Therefore, some of the key quantifiable deliverables included a 30% reduction in development time, improved system performance, and proper management of our SaaS subscriptions for customers. Covent IT's project management has been excellent. They are proactive, accurate, and take complexity in stride, <b>always meeting deadlines</b>.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients highlight Mono Software&#39;s professionalism, noting their impressive communication, adherence to deadlines, and proactive problem-solving skills. One client specifically praised their enthusiasm and understanding of business needs, which set them apart from previous providers. Overall, the sentiment is highly positive, with clients expressing satisfaction and ongoing engagement due to the quality of service and expertise provided.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="603546"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="132000"
          data-gtm_insight_id="926437"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Software Dev for Medical Billing System</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 10, 2018</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Mono Software complied with deadlines and communicated all issues clearly and on time. We used several modern communication and management tools including Skype, Redmine, and Google Hangouts. <b>Even though we worked on different continents, we didn't have any problems</b>. <b>When urgent issues arose outside their business hours, the team resolved everything swiftly</b>.
            </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, client feedback regarding RST Software&#39;s timeliness is highly positive. Multiple clients noted that RST consistently met deadlines and delivered projects on time and within budget. For instance, one client emphasized that the project was delivered on schedule and praised their effective project management. Another client highlighted their ability to maintain a fast development velocity and responsiveness, allowing them to complete multiple projects efficiently. This reliability has significantly contributed to the clients&#39; satisfaction and ongoing partnerships.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, clients express a positive sentiment regarding Futuro Team&#39;s timeliness. They consistently meet deadlines and effectively manage expectations. One client highlighted their responsiveness and proactive communication, noting that potential delays were communicated in advance, yet did not occur. Another emphasized that Futuro completed significant development work within just two weeks, showcasing their efficiency. Clients appreciate their commitment to delivering quality results on time, contributing to a collaborative and productive working atmosphere.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1904426"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1109957"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Professional
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently praise Innovation Software for their professionalism and punctuality in project delivery. One reviewer noted their &#39;creativity and punctuality,&#39; leading to a significant sales increase of 180%. The team&#39;s effective communication and use of modern technologies were highlighted as key strengths, with clients expressing satisfaction in their collaboration. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong endorsement of Innovation Software as a reliable partner for e-commerce projects.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1904426"

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "

              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Professional
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Eden Tech Labs has received overwhelmingly positive feedback regarding their professionalism. Clients highlighted their effective communication and project management skills, noting the ease of interaction with project managers. One client praised the team&#39;s ability to resolve long-standing issues swiftly, while another emphasized their professionalism in understanding project needs with minimal guidance. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for their expertise and commitment to delivering quality results.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1274151"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="175184"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1014434"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Development for Engineering Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 9, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They are <b>professionals and know that every person and business must constantly improve</b>, but for this project alone we cannot think of some.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Modeso for their timely project management and responsiveness. One reviewer noted that Modeso met all deadlines and provided exceptional support throughout the engagement. Their ability to deliver a solution within a few months, leading to a successful app launch, reflects their commitment to timeliness. Overall, the sentiment regarding Modeso&#39;s punctuality is highly positive, although there is a suggestion for improvement in their internal processes.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1894526"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="108391"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1562692"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Dev for Fintech Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 11, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They were available and responsive, and our point of contact provided exceptional support. On top of that, <b>they met deadlines</b>. We communicated via email and phone.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The overall sentiment regarding professionalism at United Ideas is highly positive. Clients consistently noted their excellent project management and communication skills, with one stating they felt &#39;never in the dark about progress.&#39; Feedback highlighted their disciplined approach, flexibility, and engagement throughout projects. A client remarked, &#39;They always delivered on their promises,&#39; while another praised their initiative and commitment. There were occasional integration challenges, yet the teams creative solutions maintained client satisfaction, underscoring their professional reliability.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Borne Digital has received positive feedback regarding their teamwork and collaboration. Clients highlighted their project managers&#39; punctuality, helpfulness, and effective communication, fostering a sense of partnership. One client noted, &#34;the whole team really got behind our project,&#34; reflecting their commitment to client goals. Another emphasized the accessibility of both local and remote teams, enhancing project management efficiency. Overall, the sentiment indicates that Borne Digital excels as a team player, contributing significantly to client satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="323167"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="143991"
          data-gtm_insight_id="848763"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Design & Dev for Recruitment Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 7, 2018</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Weve had a really positive experience with the whole team at Borne Digital, and since theyre a local London firm, theres been no language or time zone issues. Furthermore, <b>theyve been great at managing expectations and chasing us for things that we forget to get across to them quickly enough</b>! Overall, the quality of communication has been superb.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/borne-digital/143991"
            title="View Borne Digital Reviews"

        <div class="lm-only-related-block">
    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that companys size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a companys specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    </div>

%20content,%20producing%20explainer%20videos,%20product%20walkthroughs,%20commercials,%20and%20app%20videos.%20Their%20videos%20have%20generated%20over%201.3%20billion%20views,%20making%20their%20videos%20widely%20recognized%20across%20the%20globe.%20From%20concept%20to%20post-production,%20including%20scriptwriting,%20storyboarding,%20and%20motion%20graphics,%20Vidico%20delivers%20end-to-end%20video%20solutions%20that%20help%20challenger%20brands%20grow%20and%20engage%20their%20audiences.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/signature-video-group%22%20target=%22%22%3ESignature%20Video%20Group%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Toronto,%20Canada%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20Undisclosed%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2044%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%205.0%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20Signature%20Video%20Group%20(SVG)%20is%20a%20Toronto-based%20video%20production%20company%20and%20content%20agency%20specializing%20in%20creating%20impactful%20visual%20stories.%20They%20produce%20a%20wide%20range%20of%20video%20content,%20including%20broadcast%20commercials,%20branded%20documentaries,%20corporate%20communications,%20product%20demos,%20and%20training%20videos.%20SVG%20collaborates%20with%20clients%20to%20craft%20campaigns%20that%20drive%20business%20results,%20attract%20top%20talent,%20and%20simplify%20complex%20ideas.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/snowy-peak-films%22%20target=%22%22%3ESnowy%20Peak%20Films%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Denver,%20CO%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20$100%20-%20$149%20/%20hr%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2041%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%205.0%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20Snowy%20Peak%20Films%20is%20a%20Denver-based%20video%20production%20and%20animation%20company%20known%20for%20blending%20creativity%20with%20strategic%20insight.%20They%20specialize%20in%20crafting%20videos%20that%20fit%20seamlessly%20into%20broader%20marketing%20campaigns,%20focusing%20on%20maximizing%20client%20ROI%20and%20engagement.%20With%20expertise%20spanning%20directing,%20cinematography,%20editing,%20and%20animation,%20the%20Snowy%20Peak%20team%20collaborates%20closely%20with%20clients%20to%20ensure%20each%20project%20aligns%20with%20their%20vision%20and%20brand.%3C/li%3E%0A%3C/ol%3E%0A%0A%3Ch3%3ESelection%20Criteria:%20Popular%202D%20Animation%20Agencies%3C/h3%3E%0A%0AClutch%20makes%20it%20easy%20to%20find%20and%20connect%20with%20the%20best%202D%20animation%20companies%20in%20the%20world.%20The%20Clutch%20Leaders%20Matrix%20provides%20a%20broad%20view%20of%20top%202D%20animation%20agencies,%20each%20company%20featured%20is%20evaluated%20on%20specific%20criteria.%20This%20robust%20criteria%20includes%20Area%20of%20Focus%20and%20Ability%20to%20Deliver.%20Area%20of%20Focus%20accounts%20for%20a%20company%E2%80%99s%20specialization%20within%20a%20certain%20service.%20Ability%20to%20Deliver%20includes%20client%20reviews,%20past%20projects,%20market%20presence%20and%20reputation%20in%20the%20industry.%20Each%202D%20animation%20firm%20must%20provide%20evidence%20of%20successfully%20completed%20projects%20for%20previous%20clients,%20validating%20the%20project%20occurred%20and%20the%20details%20of%20the%20engagement%20are%20valid.&nbsp;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAppearances%20in%20the%20Leaders%20Matrix%20are%20not%20paid%20placements;%20companies%20cannot%20pay%20to%20be%20included.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ENote:%20This%20list%20was%20last%20updated%20on%20November%2026,%202024.%3C/div%3E"}]},{"p":"^\\/agencies\\/digital-design$","m":[{"id":"2kza5oe-m432sgnt","s":".directory-header__description-text","m":0,"ce":"Digital%20design%20has%20been%20the%20backbone%20of%20the%20online%20world!%20Agencies%20that%20offer%
